commit_message: Fixed topology link under ds/servers table page. (#7918)
pull_request_title: Fixed topology link under ds/servers table page.
pull_request_body:
Closes: https://github.com/apache/trafficcontrol/issues/6270
## Which Traffic Control components are affected by this PR? - Traffic Portal ## What is the best way to verify this PR? Go to a Delivery Service(DS). Under more, click on `Manager Servers`. If the DS has topology assigned it will show in the title else it will not. When a topology is assigned to a DS: ![image](https://github.com/apache/trafficcontrol/assets/22248619/aa775167-fcf1-4fdd-8e8a-e3e69e747042) When there is no topology assigned to a DS: ## If this is a bugfix, which Traffic Control versions contained the bug? master ## PR submission checklist - [ ] This PR has tests - [ ] This PR has documentation - [x] This PR has a CHANGELOG.md entry - [x] This PR **DOES NOT FIX A SERIOUS SECURITY VULNERABILITY** (see [the Apache Software Foundation's security guidelines](https://apache.org/security) for details)
